data.title: Demon Slayer Season 4: This is what we know about release date, cast, plot, trailer, episode count and more
data.meta_description: Demon Slayer Season 4 is set to premiere in spring 2024, earlier than expected, following the Hashira Training arc. The season will debut in cinemas worldwide, starting in February, with a special compilation film. The story will delve into Tanjiro's intense training to become a Hashira and the emergence of Nezuko's new powers.
data.text:
Synopsis

Demon Slayer Season 4 is set to premiere in spring 2024, earlier than expected, following the Hashira Training arc. The season will debut in cinemas worldwide, starting in February, with a special compilation film. The story will delve into Tanjiro's intense training to become a Hashira and the emergence of Nezuko's new powers.

Demon Slayer Season 4 is eagerly anticipated by fans worldwide. With its compelling storyline and beloved characters, the anime continues to captivate audiences. Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming season.

Release Date

Demon Slayer season four is slated for release in spring 2024. Unlike previous seasons, the upcoming season will debut earlier than anticipated, with a theatrical release titled Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - To the Hashira Training. This strategy aims to engage fans globally, with special cinema screenings starting in February in over 140 countries.

Plot Details

Demon Slayer season 4 will continue from the Swordsmith Village arc and adapt the Hashira Training arc from the manga. This storyline focuses on Tanjiro's training under various Hashira to become a high-ranking member of the Demon Slayer Corps. The season will also explore Nezuko's newfound abilities and her pursuit by Muzan Kibutsuji.

Voice Cast

The original Japanese and English voice actors are expected to return for Demon Slayer season four. This includes Natsuki Hanae and Zach Aguilar as Tanjiro Kamado, Akari Kitô and Abby Trott as Nezuko Kamado, and other talented voice artists who bring the characters to life.

Trailer

The first teaser for the Hashira Training arc has been released, offering new key art and glimpses of the upcoming season. While the teaser doesn't feature footage from the new season, it sets the stage for Tanjiro's journey and the challenges he will face.

Episode Count and Length

While the exact episode count for Demon Slayer season 4 is not confirmed, it is expected to be a full season. However, due to the limited source material for the Hashira Training arc, the season may be shorter than previous arcs. Fans can expect a concise yet impactful continuation of Tanjiro's story.

Where to Watch

Demon Slayer seasons 1-3 are available on Crunchyroll, Funimation, Netflix, and Hulu in select regions. The upcoming season is expected to be available on these platforms as well, providing fans with easy access to the latest adventures of Tanjiro and the Demon Slayer Corps.

FAQs

When will Demon Slayer season 4 be released?

Demon Slayer season 4 is set to be released in spring 2024, with a special theatrical event starting in February for fans worldwide.

Is Demon Slayer season 4 a movie or a series?

Demon Slayer season 4 is a series. However, it will debut with a compilation film featuring episodes from the previous arc before the season begins airing weekly.
